latex:
If $ x < a < 0$ means that $ x$ and $ a$ are numbers such that $ x$ is less than $ a$ and $ a$ is less than zero, then:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ x^2 < ax < 0 \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ x^2 > ax > a^2 \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ x^2 < a^2 < 0$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ x^2 > ax\text{ but }ax < 0 \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ x^2 > a^2\text{ but }a^2 < 0$
